docs.snippet: To honor the bicentennial of Mississippi’s statehood, residents throughout the state are telling the stories of their own communities with photographs using the 21st century technology of smartphones.

docs.snippet: Make your home as hospitable as a great restaurant and serve chicken parm, potato mousseline or whatever you find at the market.

docs.snippet: When I go shopping at the mall, I get perfume samples and free chocolates. When I consider health insurance plans, I am offered no such things.

docs.snippet: With at least 270 people dead, suspicion fell on the Shabab, a militant group that has been losing ground but, it now appears, perhaps not strength.
